trans-unit.source: Provides generalized transformation support for objects, such as points and rectangles.
trans-unit.target: 为点和矩形之类的对象提供通用的变换支持。

trans-unit.source: This is an abstract class.
trans-unit.target: 这是一个抽象类。

trans-unit.source: A transform defines how to map points from one coordinate space into another coordinate space.
trans-unit.target: 转换定义如何将点从一个坐标空间映射到另一个坐标空间。

trans-unit.source: They can be used to produce effects such as rotation, scaling, and skewing.
trans-unit.target: 它们可以用于生成如旋转、 缩放和倾斜的效果。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GeneralTransform" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GeneralTransform" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GeneralTransform" />, making deep copies of this object's values.
trans-unit.target: 创建此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GeneralTransform" /> 的可修改克隆，从而深度复制此对象的值。

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: 在复制依赖项属性时，此方法会复制资源引用和数据绑定（但可能不再解析），但不复制动画或其当前值。

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 当前对象的可修改复本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property will be <see langword="false" /> even if the source's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property was <see langword="true." />
trans-unit.target: 即使源的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 属性为 <see langword="true." />，所克隆的对象的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 属性也将为 <see langword="false" />

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于生成的可修改副本冻结<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象)。

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 为方便起见，此方法将隐藏继承的强类型实现的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详情，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GeneralTransform" /> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
trans-unit.target: 创建此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GeneralTransform" /> 对象的可修改复本，从而深度复制此对象的当前值。

trans-unit.source: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
trans-unit.target: 不复制资源引用、数据绑定和动画，而是复制其当前值。

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 当前对象的可修改复本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property will be <see langword="false" /> even if the source's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property was <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 即使源的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 属性为 <see langword="true" />，所克隆的对象的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 属性也将为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于生成的可修改副本冻结<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象)。

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 为方便起见，此方法将隐藏继承的强类型实现的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详情，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the inverse transformation of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GeneralTransform" />, if possible.
trans-unit.target: 如果可能，获取此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GeneralTransform" /> 的逆变换。

trans-unit.source: An inverse of this instance, if possible; otherwise <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果可能，则为此实例的逆实例；否则为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The format to use.
trans-unit.target: 要使用的格式。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: A null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic) to use the default format defined for the type of the <see cref="T:System.IFormattable" /> implementation.
trans-unit.target: null 引用（Visual Basic 中为 <see langword="Nothing" />）将使用为 <see cref="T:System.IFormattable" /> 实现的类型所定义的默认格式。

trans-unit.source: The provider to use to format the value.
trans-unit.target: 要用于对值设置格式的提供程序。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: A null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic) to obtain the numeric format information from the current locale setting of the operating system.
trans-unit.target: null 引用（Visual Basic 中为 <see langword="Nothing" />）将从操作系统的当前区域设置中获取数字格式信息。

trans-unit.source: Formats the value of the current instance using the specified format.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定格式对当前实例的值设置格式。

trans-unit.source: The value of the current instance in the specified format.
trans-unit.target: 采用指定格式的当前实例的值。

trans-unit.source: Creates a string representation of this instance.
trans-unit.target: 创建此实例的字符串表示形式。

trans-unit.source: Creates a string representation of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GeneralTransform" />.
trans-unit.target: 创建此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GeneralTransform" /> 的字符串表示形式。

trans-unit.source: A string representation of this instance.
trans-unit.target: 此实例的字符串表示形式。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.IFormatProvider" /> instance used to process this instance.
trans-unit.target: 用于处理此实例的 <see cref="T:System.IFormatProvider" /> 实例。

trans-unit.source: Creates a string representation of this instance, based on the passed <see cref="T:System.IFormatProvider" /> parameter.
trans-unit.target: 基于传递的 <see cref="T:System.IFormatProvider" /> 参数创建此实例的字符串表示形式。

trans-unit.source: A string representation of this instance, based on <paramref name="provider" />.
trans-unit.target: 基于 <paramref name="provider" /> 的此实例的字符串表示形式。

trans-unit.source: The point to transform.
trans-unit.target: 要转换的点。

trans-unit.source: Transforms the specified point and returns the result.
trans-unit.target: 变换指定的点并返回结果。

trans-unit.source: The result of transforming <paramref name="point" />.
trans-unit.target: 变换 <paramref name="point" /> 的结果。

trans-unit.source: The transform did not succeed.
trans-unit.target: 变换未成功。

trans-unit.source: The bounding box to transform.
trans-unit.target: 要变换的边界框。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, transforms the specified bounding box and returns an axis-aligned bounding box that is exactly large enough to contain it.
trans-unit.target: 在派生的类中重写时，变换指定的边界框，并返回一个正好能容纳它的与坐标轴对齐的边界框。

trans-unit.source: The smallest axis-aligned bounding box possible that contains the transformed <paramref name="rect" />.
trans-unit.target: 能容纳所变换的 <paramref name="rect" /> 的最小的与坐标轴对齐的边界框。

trans-unit.source: The point to transform.
trans-unit.target: 要转换的点。

trans-unit.source: The result of transforming <c>inPoint</c>.
trans-unit.target: 转换 <c>inPoint</c> 的结果。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, attempts to transform the specified point and returns a value that indicates whether the transformation was successful.
trans-unit.target: 在派生的类中重写时，尝试变换指定的点，并返回一个指示变换是否成功的值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="inPoint" /> was transformed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="inPoint" /> 已变换，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Unlike the <xref:System.Windows.Media.GeneralTransform.Transform%2A> method, this method does not throw an exception if the transformation is unsuccessful.
trans-unit.target: 与不同<xref:System.Windows.Media.GeneralTransform.Transform%2A>方法，此方法不会不引发异常，如果转换失败。
